tags.name: category-view-resource
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to get category data for search-based catalog navigation. It performs the services by delegating to the CatalogNavigationView BOD service.

tags.name: product-view-resource
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to get the ProductView details.

tags.name: search-profile-resource
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to create search profile.

tags.name: site-content-resource
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to get resource details for site content.

tags.name: v-2-category-resource
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to get category data for search-based catalog navigation for V2.0 store.

tags.name: v-2-product-view-resources
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to get the ProductView details.

tags.name: v-2-url-view-resource
tags.description: This class provides RESTful services to get SEO data for specified resources.

get.summary: Gets all top level categories.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: The catalog identifier. If none is specified, the store default catalog will be used.

parameters.name: checkEntitlement
parameters.description: Option to force an entitlement check.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The contractId

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency will be used.

parameters.name: depthAndLimit
parameters.description: The comma separated list of numbers is used to control the depth of sub-categories and limit the number of items returned under each child category level. The first number in this list determines the maximum number of categories (first level sub-categories) to be returned under the immediate child category. The second number in the list determines the maximum number of categories to be returned under the first level sub-categories. A value of "-1" implies no limit. In that case, only the first level categories will be returned. For example, "pageSize=4&limitSubCategories=-1,3,0,1" implies that there will be unlimited first level sub-categories under the immediate child categories.  Under these categories (up to 4), all sub-categories will be returned and a maximum of 3 second level sub-categories will be returned. There will be no third level or fourth level since the third level limit is 0. Any level after a limit of 0 will be ignored. By default, no sub-category will be returned if this parameter is not specified. When the asterisk "*" is specified, it is considered the same as "-1" but, any subsequent levels will also be treated "-1".

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" is not specified, then the store default language will be used.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field name to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a search query.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store ID.

400.description: Bad request. Some of the inputs provided to the request are not valid.

404.description: The specified resource could not be found.

500.description: Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

The first number in this list determines the maximum number of categories (first level sub-categories) to be returned under the immediate child category. By default, no sub-category will be returned if this parameter is not specified. When the asterisk "*" is specified, it is considered the same as "-1" but, any subsequent levels will also be treated "-1".

get.summary: Finds a product by its ID.

parameters.name: advancedFacetList
parameters.description: The advanced facet list.

parameters.name: associationType
parameters.description: The type of the merchandising association to be returned.

parameters.name: attachementFilter
parameters.description: The attachment filter.

parameters.name: attributeKeyword
parameters.description: The attribute associated keywords to be returned.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: The catalog identifier. If none is specified, the store default catalog will be used.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The category identifier.

parameters.name: checkEntitlement
parameters.description: Option to force an entitlement check.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The contractId

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency will be used.

parameters.name: facet
parameters.description: The selected facets.

parameters.name: facetLimit
parameters.description: The multiple name-value pairs of the facet limit defining the maximum number of items to be returned under each facet. The sequence of limits honored alongside with the sequence of facet name-value pairs.

parameters.name: filterFacet
parameters.description: The filter facet.

parameters.name: filterTerm
parameters.description: The filter term.

parameters.name: langId
parameters.description: Language identifier. If not specified, the "locale" parameter will be used. If "locale" is not specified, then the store default language will be used.

parameters.name: manufacturer
parameters.description: The manufacturer name.

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: The maximum price for the product based on the selected currency.

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: The minimum price. Based on the selected currency.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field name to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a search query.

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: The search type is a numeric string which controls the query operator: ANY, OR, AND and control what data to be returned. For a detailed list of valid values, see the online documentation on Match type (_wcf.search.type). Known valid values include : 0: ANY (exclude SKU)1: EXACT (exclude SKU), 2: ALL (exclude SKU), 3: NONE (exclude SKU), 10: ANY (include SKU), 11: EXACT (include SKU), 12: ALL (include SKU), 13: NONE (include SKU), 100: ANY (only SKU), 101: EXACT (only SKU), 102: ALL (only SKU), 103: NONE (only SKU), 1000: ANY (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1001: EXACT (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1002: ALL (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1003: NONE (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 10000: ANY (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10001: EXACT (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10002: ALL (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10003: NONE (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU)

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store ID.

400.description: Bad request. Some of the inputs provided to the request are not valid.

404.description: The specified resource could not be found.

500.description: Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

parameters.name: profileName

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: The search type is a numeric string which controls the query operator: ANY, OR, AND and control what data to be returned. For a detailed list of valid values, see the online documentation on Match type (_wcf.search.type). Known valid values include : 0: ANY (exclude SKU)1: EXACT (exclude SKU), 2: ALL (exclude SKU), 3: NONE (exclude SKU), 10: ANY (include SKU), 11: EXACT (include SKU), 12: ALL (include SKU), 13: NONE (include SKU), 100: ANY (only SKU), 101: EXACT (only SKU), 102: ALL (only SKU), 103: NONE (only SKU), 1000: ANY (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1001: EXACT (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1002: ALL (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1003: NONE (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 10000: ANY (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10001: EXACT (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10002: ALL (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10003: NONE (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU)

parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a search query.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: The term to search for.

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: The search type is a numeric string which controls the query operator: ANY, OR, AND and control what data to be returned. For a detailed list of valid values, see the online documentation on Match type (_wcf.search.type). Known valid values include : 0: ANY (exclude SKU)1: EXACT (exclude SKU), 2: ALL (exclude SKU), 3: NONE (exclude SKU), 10: ANY (include SKU), 11: EXACT (include SKU), 12: ALL (include SKU), 13: NONE (include SKU), 100: ANY (only SKU), 101: EXACT (only SKU), 102: ALL (only SKU), 103: NONE (only SKU), 1000: ANY (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1001: EXACT (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1002: ALL (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 1003: NONE (include products, kits, bundles, category level SKU) (exclude product level SKU), 10000: ANY (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10001: EXACT (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10002: ALL (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU), 10003: NONE (include category level SKU) (exclude products, kits, bundles, product level SKU)
